meanings.sent1: She counted the novenae of colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: The novenae of puppies played happily in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The novenae of ducks waddled in a line, looking quite organized.
meanings.sent4: The novenae of stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The novenae of crayons in the box offered a variety of colors to choose from.

meanings.definition: A set of nine days of religious observance or prayer.
meanings.sent1: During the novenae, the community gathered daily for prayers.
meanings.sent2: The novenae of fasting and reflection helped strengthen her faith.
meanings.sent3: The novenae of silence during the retreat was a challenge for the chatty group.
meanings.sent4: The novenae of meditation brought peace and clarity to her mind.
meanings.sent5: The novenae of pilgrimage was a spiritual journey of self-discovery.

meanings.definition: A collection of nine items or objects.
meanings.sent1: Her novenae of seashells from different beaches was displayed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The novenae of books on the shelf caught his attention.
meanings.sent3: The novenae of cupcakes on the dessert table disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The novenae of paintings on the wall added color to the room.
meanings.sent5: The novenae of marbles in the jar gleamed in the sunlight.
